trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> objects.
The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection> class provides a simple collection object that can be used to store a set of <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError> objects.
This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
For details about inheritance demands, see [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"></xref> that contains the specified array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> objects.
An array of <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> objects to initialize the collection with.
value is `null`.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"></xref> class that contains the contents of the specified <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"></xref> object with which to initialize the collection.
value is `null`.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> object to the error collection.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> object to add.
The index at which the new element was inserted.
Copies the elements of an array to the end of the error collection.
An array of type <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> that contains the objects to add to the collection.
value is `null`.
Adds the contents of the specified compiler error collection to the end of the error collection.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"></xref> object that contains the objects to add to the collection.
value is `null`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the collection contains the specified <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> to locate.
`true` if the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> is contained in the collection; otherwise, `false`.
Copies the collection values to a one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> instance at the specified index.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the values copied from <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"></xref>.
The index in the array at which to start copying.
The array indicated by the array parameter is multidimensional.
-or-

The number of elements in the is greater than the available space between the index value of the arrayIndex parameter in the array indicated by the array parameter and the end of the array indicated by the array parameter.
The array parameter is `null`.
The index parameter is less than the lowbound of the array indicated by the array parameter.
Gets a value that indicates whether the collection contains errors.
`true` if the collection contains errors; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value that indicates whether the collection contains warnings.
`true` if the collection contains warnings; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the index of the specified <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> object in the collection, if it exists in the collection.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> to locate.
The index of the specified <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> in the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"></xref>, if found; otherwise, -1.
Inserts the specified <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> into the collection at the specified index.
The zero-based index where the compiler error should be inserted.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> to insert.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the entry to locate in the collection.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> at each valid index.
The index value indicated by the index parameter is outside the valid range of indexes for the collection.
Removes a specific <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> from the collection.
The <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection"></xref>.
The specified object is not found in the collection.
